column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Had a reservation on Saturday night
column2: getting the table was smooth. Ordered Short Rib Stroganoff
column5: and a bottle of steak wine. The steak is marvelous and melting in your mouth. However the service is disappointing. The waiter tried to take the plate while my daughter was still Â eating. Then the waiter brought the bill while we still have half bottle of wine
column6: not mention that no one had come to refill the wine
column7: and not even ask for order of desert or coffee. Even the steak is good
column9: not with the rude service. There are lots of steakhouse in town with better service.
